Reports are coming in about {@LinkCreature:23#25#guerrilla officers} and other {@LinkCreature:23#19#popori rebels} skulking about the lake. They might be scouting for an attack or simply gathering intelligence. It doesn't matter. They must die.

While they're watching us, you'll watch them...die! No mercy to traitors of the kingdom.

Those who turn against the kingdom turn against nature herself. They deserved their fate.

General {@LinkCreature:223#1003$$Menani} has asked about your progress. Report in and bring her up to speed.

Don't waste the general's time, though. Stick to the facts.
This is a dark time for our kingdom. Your efforts may help us resolve this pointless conflict and restore balance to Poporia. Thank you, <PCNAME>.
